body.name: MOUNTUP UL Listed TV Wall Mount, Tilting TV Bracket for Most 26-60 Inch LED LCD OLED Flat/Curved TVs, Low Profile TV Mount Save Spacing - Fits 12" to 16" Stud, Max VESA 400x400mm up to 99 LBS, MU0007
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 17 mins
features: TV COMPATIBILITY: The tilting TV wall mount with universal design fits most 26 32 36 42 43 50 55 60 inch flat or curved TVs up to 99 lbs. Compatible with VESA 75x75 mm to 400x400 mm mounting patterns. Design for wood studs spacing up to 16 inches. NOTE: Not for drywall alone application.

ANTI-GLARING: The flat screen TV wall mount 32 inch can tilt your TV 8 degrees easily and smoothly to reduce glare for the most comfortable viewing experience. The pulling strap design helps you lock and release your TV breezily and easily.
LOW PROFILE TV WALL MOUNT: The wall mount TV bracket extends only 1.5 inches from the wall for a sleek appearance to save space.
SOLID CONSTRUCTION: TV wall mount features a heavy duty cold-formed steel construction. It has been strength tested to ensure security for your TV and your family.
EASY INSTALLATION: Comes with an easy to follow installation and all necessary hardware kit for quick and easy installation. Our TV Mount is 3-year support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MOUNTUP TILTING TV MOUNT Set up your flat or curved screen TV at a perfect viewing angle with this universal tilting TV wall mount MU0007. The TV wall mount is designed for most 26 to 55 inch LCD, LED, OLED, or Plasma Flat/Curved screens TVs. Compatible with VESA patterns from 75x75 mm to 400x400 mm. And allows wood stud spacing up to 16 inches.

HOW TO MAKE SURE THIS WALL MOUNT FITS YOUR TV? STEP 1 - CHECK WALL TYPES & STUD SPACING Model MU0007 is designed for wall mounting studs distance of 12-16 inches.It also can be mounted on the concrete or brick wall. Concrete anchors are not included, they will be sent if needed.Note: Not for dry wall alone application. STEP 2 - CHECK VESA PATTERN Make sure your TV's VESA bolt pattern falls between 75x75mm and 400x400mm. Accommodates VESA patterns: 75X75mm, 100X75mm, 100X100mm, 200X100mm, 200X200mm, 200X300mm, 300X200mm, 300X300, 400X200mm, 400X300mm,400X400mm. STEP 3 - CHECK TV SIZE & WEIGHT Confirm your TV weight is less than 99 lbs.TV size between 26 and 55 inches. STEP 4 - CHECK CABLES OUTLET Please check possible blocked cables or inputs.In that case, you may be able to install the included spacers to create more room.Please plug in your cables before hanging the tv!

STURDY HOOKS TV mounting bracket with sturdy hooks keeps the TV securely in place and prevents it from slipping. QUICK LOCK AND RELEASE The tilting TV wall mount with built-in quick-release pull tabs locks the TV in place without any tools. EASY TILT WITH KNOB Features a nice knob on TV brackets for tilting and locking the TV 8° freely.

HEAVY-DUTY STEEL CONSTRUCTION TV wall mount features a heavy-duty cold-formed steel construction. It has been strength tested to ensure security for your TV and your family. 8° OF TILT ADJUSTMENT The tilt knobs can tilt your TV 8 degrees easily and smoothly to reduce glare for the most comfortable viewing experience. LOW PROFILE DESIGN The wall mount TV bracket extends only 1.5 inches from the wall for a sleek appearance to save space. PACKAGE INCLUDE 1x TV mount, 1 x bubble level, 3 x velcro cable ties, 1x user manual, all standard mounting hardware. COMPATIBILITY - MU0007 TV bracket is perfectly compatible with the following TV models (not limited): Samsung QN43Q60RAFXZA, QN49Q60RAFXZA, QN49Q6F, QN55Q60RAFXZA, QN55Q60RAFXZA, UN32M4500, UN43NU7100FXZA, UN43RU7100FXZA, UN50RU7100FXZA, UN55B7100, UN55D7000, UN55MU6490FXZA, UN55MU8000FXZA, UN55MU8500FXZA, UN55RU7100FXZA, UN55RU8000FXZA; TCL 32S325, 32S327, 40S325, 43S325, 43S425, 49S325, 50S425, 55R617, 55S425, 55S517; Toshiba 32LF221U19, 43LF621U19, 50LF711U20, 55LF711U20. RCA UN43J5200; LG 43LJ5500, 43UM7300PUA, 49UM7300PUA, 55SK9000, 55UM7300PUA, OLED55B8PUA, OLED55C7P, OLED55C8P, OLED55C9PUA, OLED55C9PUA, OLED55E8PUA. NOTE Concrete anchors are not included, they will be sent if needed.DO NOT MOUNT ON DRYWALL ALONE!

MU0007 MU0014 MU0029 MU0012 MU0039 MU0031 TV Size Range 26"-55" 26"-55" 14"-42" 42-75" 24"-65" 37"-70" Max Load 99 LBS 88 LBS 33 LBS 100 LBS 99 LBS 88 LBS Max VESA 400x400mm 400x400mm 200x200mm 600x400mm 400x400mm 600x400mm Fits Stud Spacing up to 16" Single Stud Single Stud up to 16" flat/slanted/vaulted ceiling - Tilt Angle up 8° +5°/-10° +3°/-10° +5°/-13° +5°/-15° up 8° Swivel Angle - ± 90° ± 90° ± 45° 360° ± 25°

reviews.reviewText: I like the way it locks the TV into place, much easier than other mounts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wall mount for 26" to 60" TV.
reviews.reviewText: My TV was 46" . The wall bracket was too short for the bolt holes on the back of my TV to safely stay on the bracket. The corners of the bracket were rounded which made it worse. If the mounting holes are more than 14 1/2" on your TV you should go for the larger unit to be safe. Everything is sturdy, well designed and strong but is too short for my TV. Amazon sent me a return label. I dropped it off at CVS and when I got home Amazon had already credited my account. I ordered a larger unit and they applied the credit to the new one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked out great
reviews.reviewText: So I bought two because it said it could fit my 40 and 60 inch samsang tv. It sure did. Very happy with my purchase and price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value for the money.
reviews.reviewText: Excellent TV bracket. for a very reasonable price. You couldn't do better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product, good price
reviews.reviewText: Everything included and bubble level also. This is the first one I have seen with the pull cords to release the bottom locks. I liked it so much I ordered a second one for another room.

This TV mount is unique because the part that attaches to your wall is quite narrow. In my situation, this narrow mount allowed us to place the TV on a wall where the electrical outlet for the TV was blocked by a traditional sized TV mount. That allowed us to make use of the convenient plug and get rid of an unsightly extension cord.This narrow mount allows you to have the TV very close to the wall instead of it being pushed out several inches. It makes a big difference in a small room.I especially like that the MOUNTUP Ultra Slim TV Wall Mount has spring-loaded locks to hold the TV on. Other mounts I have used expect you to tighten a screw to do this, when you can barely fit a screwdriver behind it once the TV is on it.As another reviewer has mentioned, you should only install TV mounts into wooden studs. I don’t even trust drywall anchors for framed pictures, so a TV is much too heavy! Since this particular mount has long horizontal slots for the mounting screws, you should be able to find screw positions that hit studs.This is a well-designed TV mount at a good price. Recommended.

reviews.reviewTitle: A basic Vesa wall mount that keeps your tv close to the wall.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this from Vine for a honest review. Needed a slim tv mount for a small space and it works great.The MOUNTUP Ultra Slim TV Wall Mount comes with all the hardware you could possibly need to install your tv to your wall. A buncha of Vesa screws of various lengths. Washers. Spacers. A allen key with a screwdriver end. Some cable management velcro and 2 big fat threaded screws to keep it nice and sturdy in the wall.The part that attaches to the wall consists of 3 pieces. Two side arms and a middle bracket that attaches the two. This seems to be the weak point of the product. I would have prefered just a single bar but it does the job.There is two strings with magnetic handles on the arms. You pull these down to loosen each pin . Slide the TV on the bar so the top teeth catch it and fit into the designated groove. Pull the pin down so the bottom of the arms slide onto the bar, Then let the string go and the pin pops into place. locking the tv brackets to the bar on the wall. From here you can slide the tv left to right for adjustments.The Tv mount is able to tilt forward and back. For easy viewing. The mount does not tilt left to right though. So for this reason you must make sure your bar is level when attaching it to your wall. Because if it is not. You will be stuck with a crooked looking tv. They do include a mini level in the box but I would recommend using a real level. A long one with a accurate bubble. Making strategic marks on the wall and aligning the wall bracket to these marks.I used this to hang my older 50 inch Roku tv to my Studio wall. It went smooth. I had no problems. I would totally recommend it. TV is quite a bit closer to the wall then my last mount. I think it would be great for a business, bedroom, living room or anyone strapped for space. Thanks for reading and thanks for the mount!

Got this to install a 55 inch TV in my partially finished basement, half of which I have set up as a home gym. I wanted a TV mount that does not stick out from the wall too much as I have limited space and do not want any possibility of bumping into the TV and to lessen the chance any equipment will get caught on it if it stick out too far.I have installed a few TV mounts, the base on this one is straightforward to install. I highly recommend you install it too studs and not to drywall using anchors, this is for safety reasons, especially if you have young kids in your household. So the install is fairly simple.The main benefit of this mount is it keeps the TV as close to the wall as possible, while still giving you the ability to connect the power, audio and hdmi cords.Overall, the quality is good, it’s a solid mount and I have not worries it will break or fail.

reviews.reviewTitle: Intuitive designed TV mount - includes everything you need for installation.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this TV wall mount for my 55” TV in the bedroom. It was very easy to install and came with everything I needed for installation. Just bolt the wall mount to the wall and bolt the two TV mounts to the TV. I included pictures of both.It has a simple design. The wall mount comes in two pieces that join in the middle with a connector that joins the two pieces together with 4 provided screws. I included a picture of the wall mount installed on the wall. Only two lag bolts are required to mount the wall mount.Other nice features about this TV mount are you do not require any tools to secure the TV Mounts to the wall mount as there are two spring loaded clips attached to a lanyard that you just pull to release when you need to mount the TV or to remove. At the end of the lanyards are magnetic pieces that will hold to the TV wall mount to hide them out of sight after installation.This TV wall mount also can angle or tilt down to 12 degrees. I do not require any tilting so keeping the TV flush with the wall works great for my 55” TV.Although this TV mount comes in a small box and only looks like a few small pieces of metal, its design holds up to 99 lbs. My 55” TV is under 30 lbs. It is a breeze to install and everything you need in the package including a little level for installing the wall mount. There is nothing negative to comment on. It’s a great design and easy to install.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to install, robust TV mount but lacks a swivel adjustment
reviews.reviewText: Likes:Overall very slim profileMain support bracket is easy to secure to studs with it's versatile mounting holes.Bracket is very sturdy once mounted properly to the wallTV is easy to hang onto the bracket by yourselfTV bracket supports multiple VESA standardsDouble safety features prevents the TV from coming off the bracketDislikes:No swivel adjustmentWire spacing between the TV and wall is very cramped
